title: Garnier (Dr. P.)
body:
French doctor who published in 1858 a translation of Dr. Barral's work on the climate of Madeira. This translation is titled *Le Climat de Madère et son influence thérapeutique sur la phthisie pulmonaire*, and several important changes were introduced with the author's consent.

Dr. Garnier, who visited Madeira at the end of October 1850, also wrote a pamphlet titled: *Itinéraire de Paris à Madère* (*Union Médicale*, October, 1859).

1858: Publication of the translation of Dr. Barral's work on the climate of Madeira
